seller_info_text: Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil UK
features: ANTI-BRASS HAIR REPAIR MASQUE: Sunny Isle Color Balance Anti-Brass Hair Repair Purple Mask eliminates brassiness and unwanted dull yellow undertones.
FORMULATED FOR: Blonde, Silver, Gray Hair & Highlights
MOISTURIZES and refreshens blonde, grays and highlights leaving your hair healthy, smooth, and shiny.
NOURISHING INGREDIENTS: Sunny Isle Purple hair conditioning masque is infused with Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Coconut Oil, Bitter Orange, Green Tea and Aloe Vera.
COLOR SAFE: Sulfate FREE, Paraben FREE, Cruelty FREE
description: Product description Sunny Isle Color Balance Anti-Brass Hair Repair Purple Masque is a rich blend that neutralizes unwanted yellow undertones and brassiness. It repairs, moisturizes and refreshens blonde, grays and highlights leaving your hair healthy, smooth, and shiny. Infused with Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Coconut Oil, Bitter Orange, Green Tea and Aloe Vera. Sulfate FREE, Paraben FREE, Cruelty FREE Ingredients Puriﬁed Water, Cyclomethicone, Stearyl Alcohol, Ricinus Communis (Castor Oil), Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetyl Palmitate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Polyquaternium 10, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Oleth-2, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, EDTA, Lactic Acid, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium (Orange) Fruit Extract, EXT. D & C Violet #2, Panthenol (Pro Vitamin B5), Hydrolyzed Collagen, Hydrolyzed Silk, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Biotin. Directions After shampooing, apply a generous amount to damp hair, massage into hair, leave for 5-10 minutes, rinse out thoroughly. For best results, use once a week or as needed for deep conditioning. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Safety Warning For external use only See more
